All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AlterActions
Actions provided by the Alter menu.
Andie
Main class for A Non-Destructive Image Editor (ANDIE).
BlockAveraging
ImageOperation to apply Block averaging effect.
BrightnessConstrastSection
Image operation that adjusts the brightness and contrast of a section of an image.
BrightnessContrast
ImageOperation to adjust the brightness and contrast of an image.
ColourActions
Actions provided by the Colour menu.
ColourChannelCycle
ImageOperation to cycle the images colours based on the user choice.
ConvertToGrey
ImageOperation to convert an image from colour to greyscale.
Convolver
This class carries out a kernel convolution operation on a BufferedImage instance object.
CropActions
Actions provided by the Crop.
CropImage
ImageOperation to crop an image.
DrawEllipse
Draws an ellipse on top of the image using mouse selection
DrawingActions
Actions provided in toolbar.
DrawLine
Draws a line on top of the image using mouse selection
DrawRectangle
Draws a rectangle on top of the image
EditActions
Actions provided by the Edit menu.
EmbosFilters
ImageOperation to apply a Resize the image dimensions (simple blur) filter.
FileActions
Actions provided by the File menu.
FilterActions
Actions provided by the Filter menu.
GaussianBlur
ImageOperation to apply a Gaussian blur filter.
ImageAction
Abstract class representing actions the user might take in the interface.
ImageFlip
A class to flip images vertically or horizontally to create a mirrored image along the relevant axis.
ImageInversion
ImageOperation to invert the colours from the original image.
ImageOperation
Interface for operations to be applied to images.
ImagePanel
UI display element for EditableImages.
ImageRotate
ImageRotate to rotate the image based on the user choice.
KeyboardShortcuts
Class used to store and create keyboard shortcuts for the features and functions implemented in A Non-Destructive Image Editor (ANDIE).
LanguageActions
Applies language bundles to text on the jframe - allows options for different languages
MacroActions
 
MeanFilter
ImageOperation to apply a Resize the image dimensions (simple blur) filter.
MedianFilter
ImageOperation to apply a Median filter.
MedianFilterAction
Action to blur an image with a median filter.
RandomScatter
ImageOperation to apply random scattering effect.
Resize
ImageOperation to apply a Resize the image dimensions
SharpenFilter
ImageOperation to apply a Sharpen filter.
SoftBlur
ImageOperation to apply a Sharpen filter.
Toolbar
Actions provided by the Edit Toolbar menu
Vibrance
ImageOperation to increase the vibrance of the images colours based on the users choice
ViewActions
Actions provided by the View menu.
Warmth
ImageOperation to adjust the warmth level of the image based on the user choice
